data.title: California: Judge blocks subpoena for newspaper's photographs of Anaheim riot
data.meta_description: A superior court judge sided with the Voice of OC denying access to a public defender seeking unpublished photos taken during a July 24 riot in Anaheim by citizens denied entry to a city council meeting. The judge cited the California Shield Law allowing journalists to maintain the confidentiality of  unpublished information from news gathering. […]
data.text:
A superior court judge sided with the Voice of OC denying access to a public defender seeking unpublished photos taken during a July 24 riot in Anaheim by citizens denied entry to a city council meeting.

The judge cited the California Shield Law allowing journalists to maintain the confidentiality of unpublished information from news gathering. -db

From the Voice of OC, October 1, 2012, by the editors.
